Now You Can Become a Campa Franchise Partner, and Here You Can Apply For a Campa Cola Distributorship, Campa Cola Dealership, or Campa Cola Super Stockist; you Have to Submit Your Contact Details & Get advice from our Best Expert on Call or WhatsApp. At Your Preferred Time within a Limited Timeframe for Detailed Information to become campa cola distributor.

Thanks for Visiting our Campa Cola website, You can contact Here to our Support Executive to Become our Official Partner.

Always Deliver On Time.

We Provide PAN India Delivery.

Experienced & Certified

Our Team are Highly Experienced & We're Certified with Gov of India Regulated Terms.

We Focus on Customer Satisfaction.

Our Priority is Best Customer Service and We're onto it.
Approval Process

How our System Work?

You Have No worries about Long Paperwork & Lengthy processes or Staying in Rows for a Full Day during Your Office Hours. You Have to Follow 4 Easy Steps for Campa Cola Dealer, Distributor or Super Stockist.

Apply Now for Franchise

1.

Submit Your Enquiry

You Needs to Click on "Apply Now" Button According to Your Interest Type, Fill Your Personal Details Carefully, After That Press "SUBMIT NOW" Button and Go For Next Steps.

2.

Choose Your Interest

After Submission of Your Personal Details, Select What are You Applying For? Campa Cola Distributor, A SUPER STOCKIST? or Dealership for Entire City.

3.

Track the progress

After Selection & Submission of Your Enquiry, Our Expert Support Executive Will Call You for Verification & Next Process....

4.

Be a Campa Partners

If Everything Goes Fine, You'll Get Approval Message, & Grant You Campa Cola Franchise.
FRANCHISE

OUR PRODUCTS
Campa Cola is the best Options for You.

Discover the Refreshing World of Campa Cola Beverages!

Are you ready to tickle your taste buds and quench your thirst with something truly exciting? Allow me to introduce you to the vibrant world of Campa Cola beverages! Whether you’re a long-time fan of this iconic brand or a curious newcomer eager to explore, Campa Cola’s unique flavours and spirited personality will surely make your heart skip a beat!

A Taste of Nostalgia

For many, Campa Cola is more than just a beverage; it’s a delightful blast from the past! Introduced way back in the 1970s, this fizzy drink quickly became a household name in India. With its bold flavours and eye-catching packaging, Campa Cola holds a special place in the hearts of generations. Today, it’s making a sensational comeback, and we couldn’t be more thrilled! If you haven’t tried it yet, get ready for a fizzy ride through its delicious flavour profiles!

Diverse Flavors for Every Palate

What sets Campa Cola apart from other soft drinks is its diverse range of unique and exciting flavours. From the classic Campa Cola Original, with its irresistible caramel flavour, to the tangy and refreshing Campa Lemon, there’s something to please every palate. And let’s not forget the exhilarating Campa Orange, bursting with citrusy zest—perfect for those sun-soaked days when all you need is a splash of sunshine!

A Perfect Companion for Every Occasion

Whether you’re hosting a backyard barbecue, enjoying a cosy movie night with friends, or simply lounging under the sun, Campa Cola is the ultimate companion! Its effervescent fizz and tantalizing flavours elevate any occasion and add a pop of fun to your sip. Imagine clinking glasses filled with ice-cold Campa Cola as you celebrate life’s little moments—it’s the kind of joy that stays with you!

Sustainability Matters!

In this day and age, being eco-conscious is essential. Campa Cola is committed to sustainability and is making strides in innovative packaging and production processes. The brand’s dedication to reducing its environmental footprint ensures that while you enjoy your favourite fizzy drink, you’re also contributing to a greener planet. It’s refreshing to know that sipping on your Campa Cola can feel good in more ways than one!

Join the Campa Revolution!

With its rich legacy and contemporary comeback, Campa Cola is not just a beverage; it’s a cultural experience! The excitement surrounding its resurgence is palpable, and we encourage everyone to jump on the bandwagon. Gather your friends, pop open a few cans, and embark on a nostalgic journey filled with laughter, stories, and, of course, refreshing flavours!

In conclusion, whether you’re reminiscing or discovering Campa Cola for the first time, this beloved beverage is sure to leave you buzzing with delight. So why wait? Grab a bottle (or two) today, and let the fizzy magic of Campa Cola invigorate your life. Cheers to delicious adventures ahead!

What ingredients are in Campa Cola?

The specific ingredients in Campa Cola may vary slightly based on the product variant, but generally, typical ingredients found in cola beverages like Campa Cola include:

  1. Carbonated Water – The primary ingredient that provides the fizzy texture.
  2. High Fructose Corn Syrup or Sugar – Sweeteners that give the cola its sweetness.
  3. Caramel Color – For coloring the drink, giving it the classic cola appearance.
  4. Caffeine – A stimulant that is typically part of cola drinks.
  5. Natural and Artificial Flavors – To create the distinct cola flavor.
  6. Phosphoric Acid – Used to add acidity and flavor.
  7. Citric Acid – For additional tartness.
  8. Preservatives – To enhance shelf life (such as sodium benzoate).

For the most accurate and current ingredient list, it is advisable to check the packaging

How does Campa Cola compare to Coca-Cola and Pepsi?

Campa Cola is a soft drink brand that has gained attention recently, especially in the Indian market. It is known for its affordability, with prices such as Rs 10 for a 200 ml bottle and Rs 20 for a 500 ml bottle, which is cheaper than competitors like Coke and Pepsi. The drink contains no fruit, but includes caffeine and various flavoring substances. It appears that PepsiCo and Coca-Cola are responding to Campa Cola’s presence by considering cheaper soft drink options for regional markets.

Is Campa Cola available in international markets?

As of now, Campa Cola primarily focuses on the Indian market and has not established a significant presence in international markets. The brand was relaunched in India in 2022 after being dormant for some time, and efforts are currently aimed at expanding its reach within the country. While there may be potential for future expansion, any availability in international markets has not been officially announced.

Where can I buy Campa Cola?

Campa Cola can often be found in grocery stores, supermarkets, and convenience stores, particularly in India, where the brand is most popular. You may also find it online on e-commerce platforms like Amazon or Flipkart. Additionally, check local beverage distributors or regional shops that stock a variety of soft drinks. Availability may vary by location, so it’s a good idea to check with specific retailers.

How to get Campa Cola distributor?

Becoming a Campa Cola distributor Generally involves a few steps:

Research: Start by gathering information about Campa Cola, its product range, and its market presence. This will help you understand the brand and its target audience.

Contact the Company: Reach out to the Campa Cola company directly. You can get Campa cola contact Number information on their official website. Inquire about their retail partnership program and requirements for becoming a retailer.

Retail Business Registration: Ensure that your initial retail business is legally registered. You may need a specific type of license to sell beverages, depending on your location.

Meet Requirements: Be prepared to meet any requirements set by Campa Cola for retailers. This could include minimum order quantities, storage conditions, or promotional commitments.

Set Up Distribution: After your application is approved, you will need to set up how you will receive and store the products. This may involve setting up a supply chain or working with a distributor.

Market Your Business: Once you have the product, develop a marketing plan to attract customers. You can do promotions, in-store displays, and social media marketing.

Maintaining Inventory: Regularly monitor your inventory and sales to ensure that you can meet customer demand.

For precise steps and conditions, contacting Campa Cola directly is the best approach, as processes may vary based on location and market strategy.

What other products does Campa Cola offer?

Campa Cola, originally known for its soft drinks, has expanded its product range over the years to include various beverages. Some of the products offered by Campa include:

  1. Campa Cola – The original cola drink.
  2. Campa Lemon – A lemon-flavored soft drink.
  3. Campa Orange – An orange-flavored carbonated beverage.
  4. Campa Grapefruit – A grapefruit-flavored soft drink.
  5. Campa Soda – A clear carbonated soda option.

In recent years, there has been a revival of the brand, and it has introduced new variants and flavors to cater to changing consumer preferences. Additionally, Campa has been working to re-establish its presence in the competitive soft drink market in India.

Who is Campa Cola's owner?

Campa Cola’s owner:  Campa Cola is owned by Mukesh Ambani. He is the chairman of Reliance Industries. Campa Cola got acquired by Reliance Industries on August 31, 2022 at an purchase amount of ₹22Cr INR.

Who is the brand ambassador of Campa Cola?

As of October 2023, the brand ambassador for Campa Cola is Bollywood actor Salman Khan. He was announced as the face of the brand during its revival campaign, which aims to re-establish Campa Cola in the competitive soft drink market in India.

Who is the manufacturer of Campa Cola?

Reliance Industries manufactures Campa Cola through its fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) arm, Reliance Consumer Products Limited (RCPL).

Who is the distributor of Campa Cola?

Officially Reliance Consumer Products Limited announced a pan-India distribution partnership with B2B retails and kirana platform Udaan, for its Distribution Network for Campa range of soft drinks.

What is the official website of campa cola?

Campacolabeverages.com & Campabeverages.com are now official website of campa cola.
